mutants.code:
from math import comb

def num_rolls_to_target(d: int, f: int, target: int) -> int:
    MOD = 1000000008
    if target < d or target > d * f:
        return 0
    target = target - d
    sum_ways = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i <= target:
        y = target - i
        if j % 2 == 0:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways + comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        else:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways - comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        j += 1
        i += f
    return sum_ways

def num_rolls_to_target(d: int, f: int, target: int) -> int:
    MOD = 1000000007
    if target < d or target > d / f:
        return 0
    target = target - d
    sum_ways = 0

    j = 0
    while i <= target:
        y = target - i
        if j % 2 == 0:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways + comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        else:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways - comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD

from math import comb

def num_rolls_to_target(d: int, f: int, target: int) -> int:
    MOD = 1000000007
    if target < d or target > d + f:
        return 0
    target = target - d
    sum_ways = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i <= target:
        y = target - i
        if j % 2 == 0:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways + comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        else:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways - comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        j += 1
        i += f
    return sum_ways

from math import comb

def num_rolls_to_target(d: int, f: int, target: int) -> int:
    MOD = 1000000007
    if target < d or target > d * f:
        return 0
    target = target - d
    sum_ways = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i <= target:
        y = target - i
        if j % 2 == 0:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways + comb(d, j) * comb(y * d - 1, y)) % MOD
        else:
            sum_ways = (sum_ways - comb(d, j) * comb(y + d - 1, y)) % MOD
        j += 1
